file_content.text: The Jedi will fall--and when they are gone, the galaxy will forget their very existence.
The Republic battle plans for the Jedi Temple. All the data, all the relics they wish to recover....
We will purge it all. Our revenge upon the Jedi will proceed.
I ask you: Stop the attack on the Jedi Temple, and find out what the Republic is seeking there.
Never forget why we do this. Never forget that the Jedi burned Korriban a thousand years ago.
Now we fulfill our sacred promise of vengeance. We demolished the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, and we have conquered their temple on Ilum.
Until we march through their training grounds, it will not be victory.
I wish it was their homeworld.
But it is a beginning.
You serve the Dark Council well. I approve.
Is that so? Excellent work.
You honor me. And I offer what I know.
It sounds like the war on Ilum is going well.
Then we're making progress.
For the moment. And in this uncertainty, there is opportunity.
Taking out a Jedi Temple isn't easy.
Not a bad day's work.
No. Nor is keeping it.
There's a temple on Ilum?
We seized the Jedi's headquarters almost as soon as we arrived. It is ancient... a blight on this world.
Sith vengeance isn't my thing.
It is not my place to correct you, my lord.
Show respect for the tradition you participate in.
The Republic wishes to retake what was theirs, and our garrison inside their temple may not be enough to defend it.
We must crush the Republic counterattack and seize their leaders' battle plans. Whatever they seek to save from the temple, we will destroy.
We deliver a blow and learn the enemy's vulnerabilities in one stroke. I'll see to it.
It's an efficient plan.
You have my undying gratitude. With your help, we will keep the temple and burn away its impurities.
So? Go and fight them.
For ten generations, my bloodline has devoted itself to one study--the purge of all things Jedi.
Your success here is more likely than mine. And in this matter, success is more valuable than my pride and my bloodlust.
Not my concern. [Refuse quest]
Very well. We shall find a way.
We have taken the Jedi Temple. It is a good day for the Empire.
